Articles.Content:
KSP is delightful. Quite.

Just wanted to share my perfect launch trajectory toward Minmus. Landed about a week later after playing with my orbit. Returned to Kerbin and promptly crashed into a mountain about a kilometre away from the ocean I was aiming for.

Dag nabbit.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Excellent job, did you know Minmus is easier than the Mun? Try doing that too if you haven\'t.

Welcome to the Forums! I\'m sure you\'ll find us to be quite the lively bunch.

Congratulations on your Minmusan venture.

Have fun!

- Your Friendly Neighborhood Moderator,

Radion Spaceworks

> 
> Excellent job, did you know Minmus is easier than the Mun? Try doing that too if you haven\'t.

I\'ve landed on the Mun often enough, but this was the first time I aimed for Minmus and I hit it spot-on. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
